latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Reinspection Required Fines pending

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to arrange/conduct criminal/SCR background clearance checks for required individuals failed to re-clear required individuals with the SCR every two years
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to provide constant and competent supervision for children within its care
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Required food protection procedures were not implemented at time of inspection Holder of food protection certificate was not on site during hours of food preparation activity
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service providing care without a staff member trained in First Aid/CPR on site at time of inspection
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service unable to document that all children enrolled have had an age appropriate medical evaluation
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection first aid kit was not provided or maintained
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service allows staff to perform their duties that are not healthy or are incapable of carrying out their duties Staff medical clearances are not maintained by child care service
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At the time child care service was providing care it has been determined that the child care service failed to limit areas used by children to their exclusive use Unauthorized children and/or adults allowed to inhabit child care service facilities during child care hours
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service facility observed not maintained or in disrepair Dry sweeping observed in areas occupied by children
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to conduct and document monthly fire drills
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service fails to provide updated copy of New York City Health Code to staff
